issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
We found that while job succeeds (can be seen as successful in RM), but as writing of jhist file fails, job cant be seen in JobHistory.

{noformat}
2015-07-04 14:54:37,852 INFO [Thread-94] org.apache.hadoop.service.AbstractService: Service org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.v2.app.MRAppMaster failed in state STOPPED; cause: org.apache.hadoop.yarn.exceptions.YarnRuntimeException: java.io.IOException: All datanodes 9.96.1.171:25009 are bad. Aborting...

We can probably mark the job as failure and inform RM if this happens. Thoughts ?
fields.summary: Job History can be lost if there is any issue in writing jhist file while AM shuts down job

comments.body: Same as MAPREDUCE-5703 it seems. But how will MAPREDUCE-5547 resolve it ? IIUC, that talks about doing unregistration before jhist writing. But jhist writing can still fail afterwards and there will be no way to tell RM about it.
